regtests.input:
#TOOL=simplemd
inputfile input.xyz
 outputfile output.xyz
 temperature 0.722
 tstep 0.005
 friction 1
 forcecutoff 2.5
 listcutoff  3.0
 nstep 50
 nconfig 10 trajectory.xyz
 nstat   10 energies.dat
